you got to be kidding me

Yeah.  Kinda puts all those marathon Atari and Nintendo sleep-overs in perspective :P.

Evidently he quit his job to hang out at an online parlor.  Only left the desk to crap and sleep under a table.  Someone from his family showed up looking for him and he told them he'd finish his game and come home.  Couple hours later, he was dead o.o

Blizzard should take this as a lesson and quit pooping out WC and Diablo stuff long enough to make SC2 and then maybe gamers like this could get their fix without DYING :P
